project_abstract.cdata: The Second Xinjiang Highway Project will build on the achievements of the on-going Xinjiang Highway Project. The project will have the following objectives: a) support road infrastructure to relieve congestion and stimulate socio-economic development in the Urumqui-Kuitun Highway (UKH) corridor; b) improve maintenance of the regional highway network; c) promote development of institutional capacities of Xinjiang Communications Department (XCD) through training and other means; d) increase highway safety; and e) promote transport linkages with neighboring provinces and countries. The scope of the project includes: a) construction of highway between Urumqi and Kuitun; b) construction rehabilitation and upgrading of linking roads to UKH interchanges; c) construction supervision of UKH and linking roads; d) a highway maintenance component; e) equipment procurement; f) institutional strengthening and training of staff of the XCD and related agencies and institutes; g) a highway safety component;and h) a strategic study of regional transport within Xinjiang and between Xinjiang and neighboring provinces and countries.

P003643.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二新疆公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将依托在建新疆公路项目的成果，其目标如下：（1）支持道路基础设施建设，以缓解乌鲁木齐—奎屯公路沿线交通拥堵状况，刺激社会经济发展；（2）提高区域路网养护水平；（3）通过培训和其它措施促进新疆交通厅机构能力建设；（4）提高公路安全水平；（5）促进与邻省和邻国的交通联系。项目具体内容包括：（1）建设乌鲁木齐—奎屯公路；（2）建设和升级改造通往乌奎公路立交桥的连接道路；（3）乌奎公路和连接道路施工监理；（4）公路养护；（5）设备采购；（6）机构加强、新疆交通厅及相关机构和研究所人员培训；（7）公路安全；（8）新疆区内及新疆和邻省和邻国之间区域交通战略研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
